DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to establish if a low-nitrosamine, smokeless tobacco product (Swedish snus) can help adult smokers to reduce and eventually completely quit smoking.
DOC.criteria: Male and female smokers in good general health aged 2065 years regularly smoking >10 cigarettes per day for more than 1 year who are motivated to reduce or quit smoking Subjects with uncontrolled hypertension, history of coronary heart disease or other significant heart condition History of other significant medical condition that might interfere with study procedures Pregnant or nursing mother Current drug abuse.
